text:
Hi! Drag and drop emails do not have the ability to be copied between portals, you'll have to recreate the email in the other portal. The next best option would be to grab the emails HTML and add that to the other portal as a custom email.
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/how-do-i-get-the-html-of-an-email-i-sent-from-HubSpot>
